title: Church Hymnary, Fourth Edition
Presbyterian Hymnal
Trinity Hymnal
Rejoice in the Lord
text:
1 Blessing and honor and glory and pow'r,

wisdom and and riches and strength evermore

give ye to him who our battle hath won,

whose are the kingdom, the crown, and the throne.


2 Into the heav'n of the heav'ns hath he gone,

sittest he now in the joy of the throne,

weareth he now of the kingdom the crown,

singeth he now the new song with his own.


3 Soundeth the heav'n of the heav'ns with his name,

ringeth the earth with his glory and fame,

ocean and mountains, stream, forest, and flow'r

echo his praises and tell of his pow'r.


3 Ever ascendeth the song and the joy;

ever descendeth the love from on high;

sing we the song of the Lamb that was slain,

dying in weakness and rising to reign.

title: Hymns for Youth
text:
1. Blessing and honor and glory and power,

Wisdom and riches and strength evermore

Give ye to Him who our battle hath won,

Whose are the kingdom, the crown, and the throne.


2. Soundeth the heaven of the heavens with His name;

Ringeth the earth with His glory and fame.

Ocean and mountain, stream, forest and flower

Echo His praises and tell of his power.


3. Ever ascendeth the song and the joy;

Ever descendeth the love from on high.

Blessing and honor and glory and praise--

This is the theme of the hymns that we raise.


4. Give we the glory and praise to the lamb;

Take we the robe and the harp and the palm;

Sing we the song of the lamb that was slain,

Dying in meekness but rising to reign.

title: Trinity Hymnal
